p: Under the RCP 4.5, in the scenario of a mean temperature rise of 2.4Â°C, there is not much decrease in the sugarcane yield during the End Century compared to the other two crops. The crop productivity in the areas of Thirukalikundram, Lathur, Uthiramerur, Wallajabad, Thiruvalangadu, Tiruttani, Thiruvallur, and Poondi blocks are likely to be affected more in the Mid and End Century periods ( Fig 10).
